ygData.subject: RE: I give up
ygData.msgSnippet: As for running out of Mana (My Int is 115 btw), I actually can quite easily in a big fight. Cast Darkness and Boil Blood a few times and suddenly your OOM.
ygData.messageBody:
As for running out of Mana (My Int is 115 btw), I actually can quite easily
in a big fight. Cast Darkness and Boil Blood a few times and suddenly your
OOM.

Quite thought though, I would like to see FD cast quicker. I group with
monks a lot and for them it is a great skill, but by the time I need it I
can't cast it fast enough.

Thom


-----Original Message-----
From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 2:00 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] I give up


From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>

> "Steven E. Phipps" wrote:
>
> The only thing I can think of that would make the small race SK more
> viable, without making the large race SK more powerful would be the
> introduction of a few SK only items. (+hp items, or whatever) that are
> medium small only.
> I see no way to up class power for one race and not the other. Only by
> Item that large races cannot wear, that are SK only, do I see the
> possibility.
>

Lifetap helps Human/DE more because they have more mana. And Trolls
have regen so they don't need it as much. As it stands, it's hard to
run out of mana, even when constantly fighting.

(In a group recently, the enchanter claritied me! lol! Talk about
too much mana)

Xilith
